ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 ounce) can fully cooked luncheon meat (such as SPAM®), cubed
½ cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip™)

cookingTips: Cook SPAM cubes until edges are slightly caramelized for better flavor
Mix warm SPAM with cheese and dressing for easier sandwich assembly
Toast buns lightly to prevent sogginess from the warm mixture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How would you balance the salty, rich SPAM flavor with complementary sides?
